attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our pedophilic, racist, and orange president but the opening screen bothers me a lot. i hate seeing how dry his skin is, he has so much money, but can't afford moisturizer? after waiting for 9 hours for the download to FINALLY finish, i opened it and all the lights in my house went out and i heard loud screaming so i got scared and before i knew it, i had turned into trump
attributes.title: awful, need therapy

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support my president, instead I got scammed. The app constantly made my phone crash. It also hacked my information! I tried to order some Trump 2020 t-shirts and when i put in my credit card number to pay, it hacked my credit card. I really wish this app was good but it just isn’t! It’s a scam, DO NOT TRUST!!!!! please!!!!!
With Concern-
Debra S.
attributes.title: It made my phone crash numberous times:(

attributes.review: i was greeted by a grease dipped Cheeto when i entered the app. i was completely taken aback at first sight, disgusted even, i almost threw up but i held it down despite my nonstop gagging. about 1 minute into having it open, my body started having convulsions and i had to be rushed to the emergency room. please apple, remove this app, it’s terrifying!!! it will haunt me for the rest of my life!!!
attributes.title: awful horrible disgusting. remove this app

attributes.review: I hate this app I had high hopes to and the spam of adds and the of notifications like every hour I hate it sooo much it does not work on phones it just crashes and stuff also we will not let you delete TikTok without a fight you thought we would just let you hahaha your funny anyways I hate this app sooo much no one get this app 🤢🤮🤮 and yes I’m a part of gen z
attributes.title: This app I hate it 🤮🤮🤮🤮 TikTokkkkk 👁👄👁

attributes.review: I have always been a trump supporter, but after downloading this app I can only think about oranges and cheetos. It’s the only color I can see and all of my thoughts are about them. Everyone looks like annoying orange ever since I tried the new hypnosis feature in this app. Seems a little sketchy, please remove this from the App Store so no one else has to be in my shoes
attributes.title: Put a curse on me

attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE! i first downloaded it and my phone started glitching sooo bad. then little ✨monsters✨ started coming out of my phone whispering, like trying to brainwash me yk? and then they started throwing 🍊oranges 🍊 at me! then they started singing “ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆” then once i deleted it everything went back to normal! so i definitely DO NOT recommend 🧚🏻‍♀️✨🧚🏻‍♀️✨
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: This app is terrible! I is the time of my day to come over and see you tomorrow night and then go to sleep and then go to get my dad and get my car then go back and then go to the store to pick it out because i'm the way you want to me i was a really good night i is the night you want me i was the night i was the best night out there. Thanks! Delete this app!
attributes.title: Unbelievable

attributes.review: I thought since I wasn’t sure who I was going to vote for this year’s presidential race, I thought I might as well research more about trump only to realize what he is accused for is true. As he hola his reputation for insulting different races, genders, and groups of people, the “home” category use harsh descriptive words to talk about the other candidates. I just think I’m general he is a awful person and this app proves it.
attributes.title: INSULTING

attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with the current events of the campaign, and it just kept lagging my phone out. It would kick me out of the app for no reason, and got to the point where it gave my phone a virus. This virus was on my phone for weeks, but thankfully I got rid of it. I would not recommend this app to keep up with current events therefore it may give you a virus too. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: GARBAGE

attributes.review: To start, I genuinely liked Triumph in office. He’s so good at keeping the privileged with the privileged and staying silent on BLM and ICE issues. Me being someone who is a supremacist decided to get this app in search of an accurate media representation of the president, and after looking throughly through this app and a few others. I came to the conclusion that... it’s not the app that’s bad. It’s the president. #settleforBiden
attributes.title: This app is so disappointing..
